an2.11:1.6: ‘kayaduccaritassa kho papako vipako ditthe ceva dhamme abhisamparayanca, vaciduccaritassa papako vipako ditthe ceva dhamme abhisamparayanca, manoduccaritassa papako vipako ditthe ceva dhamme abhisamparayanca’ti.
an2.11:1.7: So iti patisankhaya kayaduccaritam pahaya kayasucaritam bhaveti, vaciduccaritam pahaya vacisucaritam bhaveti, manoduccaritam pahaya manosucaritam bhaveti, suddham attanam pariharati.
an2.11:2.2: Tatra, bhikkhave, yamidam bhavanabalam sekhanametam balam.
an2.11:2.3: Sekhanhi so, bhikkhave, balam agamma ragam pajahati, dosam pajahati, moham pajahati.
an2.11:2.4: Ragam pahaya, dosam pahaya, moham pahaya yam akusalam na tam karoti, yam papam na tam sevati.
an2.12:1.6: ‘kayaduccaritassa kho papako vipako ditthe ceva dhamme abhisamparayanca, vaciduccaritassa papako vipako ditthe ceva dhamme abhisamparayanca, manoduccaritassa papako vipako ditthe ceva dhamme abhisamparayanca’ti.
an2.12:1.7: So iti patisankhaya kayaduccaritam pahaya kayasucaritam bhaveti, vaciduccaritam pahaya vacisucaritam bhaveti, manoduccaritam pahaya manosucaritam bhaveti, suddham attanam pariharati.
an2.12:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satisambojjhangam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vosaggaparinamim,
an2.12:2.8: upekkhasambojjhangam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vosaggaparinamim.
an2.13:1.6: ‘kayaduccaritassa kho papako vipako ditthe ceva dhamme abhisamparayanca, vaciduccaritassa kho papako vipako ditthe ceva dhamme abhisamparayanca, manoduccaritassa kho papako vipako ditthe ceva dhamme abhisamparayanca’ti.
an2.13:1.7: So iti patisankhaya kayaduccaritam pahaya kayasucaritam bhaveti, vaciduccaritam pahaya vacisucaritam bhaveti, manoduccaritam pahaya manosucaritam bhaveti, suddham attanam pariharati.
an2.13:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kamehi, vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an2.13:2.3: Vitakkavicaranam vupasama ajjhattam sampasadanam cetaso ekodibhavam avitakkam avicaram samadhijam pitisukham dutiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an2.13:2.4: Pitiya ca viraga upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajano, sukhanca kayena patisamvedeti, yam tam ariya acikkhanti: ‘upekkhako satima sukhavihari’ti tatiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an2.13:2.5: Sukhassa ca pahana dukkhassa ca pahana pubbeva somanassadomanassanam atthangama adukkhamasukham upekkhasatiparisuddhim catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an2.14:1.4: Ima kho, bhikkhave, dve tathagatassa dhammadesana”ti.
an2.15:1.1: “Yasmim, bhikkhave, adhikarane apanno ca bhikkhu codako ca bhikkhu na sadhukam attanava attanam paccavekkhati tasmetam, bhikkhave, adhikarane patikankham:
an2.15:1.2: ‘dighattaya kharattaya valattaya samvattissati, bhikkhu ca na phasum viharissanti’ti.
an2.15:1.3: Yasminca kho, bhikkhave, adhikarane apanno ca bhikkhu codako ca bhikkhu sadhukam attanava attanam paccavekkhati tasmetam, bhikkhave, adhikarane patikankham:
an2.15:1.4: ‘na dighattaya kharattaya valattaya samvattissati, bhikkhu ca phasum viharissanti’ti.
an2.15:2.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, apanno bhikkhu sadhukam attanava attanam paccavekkhati?
an2.15:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, apanno bhikkhu iti patisancikkhati:
an2.15:2.3: ‘aham kho akusalam apanno kancideva desam kayena.
an2.15:2.4: Mam so bhikkhu addasa akusalam apajjamanam kancideva desam kayena.
an2.15:2.5: No ce aham akusalam apajjeyyam kancideva desam kayena, na mam so bhikkhu passeyya akusalam apajjamanam kancideva desam kayena.
an2.15:2.6: Yasma ca kho, aham akusalam apanno kancideva desam kayena, tasma mam so bhikkhu addasa akusalam apajjamanam kancideva desam kayena.
an2.15:2.7: Disva ca pana mam so bhikkhu akusalam apajjamanam kancideva desam kayena anattamano ahosi.
an2.15:2.8: Anattamano samano anattamanavacanam mam so bhikkhu avaca.
an2.15:2.9: Anattamanavacanaham tena bhikkhuna vutto samano anattamano ahosim.
an2.15:2.11: Iti mameva tattha accayo accagama sunkadayakamva bhandasmin’ti.
an2.15:2.12: Evam kho, bhikkhave, apanno bhikkhu sadhukam attanava attanam paccavekkhati.
an2.15:3.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, codako bhikkhu sadhukam attanava attanam paccavekkhati?
an2.15:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, codako bhikkhu iti patisancikkhati:
an2.15:3.3: ‘ayam kho bhikkhu akusalam apanno kancideva desam kayena.
an2.15:3.4: Aham imam bhikkhum addasam akusalam apajjamanam kancideva desam kayena.
an2.15:3.5: No ce ayam bhikkhu akusalam apajjeyya kancideva desam kayena, naham imam bhikkhum passeyyam akusalam apajjamanam kancideva desam kayena.
an2.15:3.6: Yasma ca kho, ayam bhikkhu akusalam apanno kancideva desam kayena, tasma aham imam bhikkhum addasam akusalam apajjamanam kancideva desam kayena.
an2.15:3.7: Disva ca panaham imam bhikkhum akusalam apajjamanam kancideva desam kayena anattamano ahosim.
an2.15:3.8: Anattamano samano anattamanavacanaham imam bhikkhum avacam.
an2.15:3.9: Anattamanavacanayam bhikkhu maya vutto samano anattamano ahosi.
an2.15:3.11: Iti mameva tattha accayo accagama sunkadayakamva bhandasmin’ti.
an2.15:3.12: Evam kho, bhikkhave, codako bhikkhu sadhukam attanava attanam paccavekkhati.
an2.15:4.1: Yasmim, bhikkhave, adhikarane apanno ca bhikkhu codako ca bhikkhu na sadhukam attanava attanam paccavekkhati tasmetam, bhikkhave, adhikarane patikankham dighattaya kharattaya valattaya samvattissati, bhikkhu ca na phasum viharissantiti.
an2.15:4.2: Yasminca kho, bhikkhave, adhikarane apanno ca bhikkhu codako ca bhikkhu sadhukam attanava attanam paccavekkhati tasmetam, bhikkhave, adhikarane patikankham na dighattaya kharattaya valattaya samvattissati, bhikkhu ca phasum viharissanti”ti.
an2.16:1.1: Atha kho annataro brahmano yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
an2.16:1.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho so brahmano bhagavantam etadavoca:
an2.16:1.3: “ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu ko paccayo yena m’idhekacce satta kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjanti”ti?
an2.16:1.4: “Adhammacariyavisamacariyahetu kho, brahmana, evam’idhekacce satta kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjanti”ti.
an2.16:2.1: “Ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu ko paccayo yena m’idhekacce satta kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjanti”ti?
an2.16:2.2: “Dhammacariyasamacariyahetu kho, brahmana, evam’idhekacce satta kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjanti”ti.
an2.16:3.2: Seyyathapi, bho gotama, nikkujjitam va ukkujjeyya, paticchannam va vivareyya, mulhassa va maggam acikkheyya, andhakare va telapajjotam dhareyya: ‘cakkhumanto rupani dakkhanti’ti; evamevam bhota gotamena anekapariyayena dhammo pakasito.
an2.16:3.3: Esaham bhavantam gotamam saranam gacchami dhammanca bhikkhusanghanca.
an2.16:3.4: Upasakam mam bhavam gotamo dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatan”ti.
an2.17:1.1: Atha kho janussoni brahmano yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
an2.17:1.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho janussoni brahmano bhagavantam etadavoca:
an2.17:1.3: “ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu ko paccayo yena m’idhekacce satta kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjanti”ti?
an2.17:1.5: Evam’idhekacce satta kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjanti”ti.
an2.17:1.6: “Ko pana, bho gotama, hetu ko paccayo yena m’idhekacce satta kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjanti”ti?
an2.17:1.8: Evam’idhekacce satta kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjanti”ti.
an2.17:1.9: “Na kho aham imassa bhoto gotamassa sankhittena bhasitassa vittharena attham avibhattassa vittharena attham ajanami.
an2.17:1.10: Sadhu me bhavam gotamo tatha dhammam desetu yatha aham imassa bhoto gotamassa sankhittena bhasitassa vittharena attham avibhattassa vittharena attham ajaneyyan”ti.
an2.17:1.11: “Tena hi, brahmana, sunahi, sadhukam manasi karohi; bhasissami”ti.
an2.17:1.12: “Evam, bho”ti kho janussoni brahmano bhagavato paccassosi.
an2.17:2.1: “Idha, brahmana, ekaccassa kayaduccaritam katam hoti, akatam hoti kayasucaritam;
an2.17:2.2: vaciduccaritam katam hoti, akatam hoti vacisucaritam;
an2.17:2.3: manoduccaritam katam hoti, akatam hoti manosucaritam.
an2.17:2.4: Evam kho, brahmana, katatta ca akatatta ca evam’idhekacce satta kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjanti.
an2.17:2.5: Idha pana, brahmana, ekaccassa kayasucaritam katam hoti, akatam hoti kayaduccaritam;
an2.17:2.6: vacisucaritam katam hoti, akatam hoti vaciduccaritam;
an2.17:2.7: manosucaritam katam hoti, akatam hoti manoduccaritam.
an2.17:2.8: Evam kho, brahmana, katatta ca akatatta ca evam’idhekacce satta kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjanti”ti.
an2.17:3.1: “Abhikkantam, bho gotama …pe… upasakam mam bhavam gotamo dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatan”ti.
an2.18:1.1: Atha kho ayasma anando yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho ayasmantam anandam bhagava etadavoca:
an2.18:1.2: “ekamsenaham, ananda, akaraniyam vadami kayaduccaritam vaciduccaritam manoduccaritan”ti.
an2.18:1.3: “Yamidam, bhante, bhagavata ekamsena akaraniyam akkhatam kayaduccaritam vaciduccaritam manoduccaritam tasmim akaraniye kayiramane ko adinavo patikankho”ti?
an2.18:1.4: “Yamidam, ananda, maya ekamsena akaraniyam akkhatam kayaduccaritam vaciduccaritam manoduccaritam tasmim akaraniye kayiramane ayam adinavo patikankho—
an2.18:1.9: kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati.
an2.18:1.10: Yamidam, ananda, maya ekamsena akaraniyam akkhatam kayaduccaritam vaciduccaritam manoduccaritam tasmim akaraniye kayiramane ayam adinavo patikankho”ti.
an2.18:2.1: “Ekamsenaham, ananda, karaniyam vadami kayasucaritam vacisucaritam manosucaritan”ti.
an2.18:2.2: “Yamidam, bhante, bhagavata ekamsena karaniyam akkhatam kayasucaritam vacisucaritam manosucaritam tasmim karaniye kayiramane ko anisamso patikankho”ti?
an2.18:2.3: “Yamidam, ananda, maya ekamsena karaniyam akkhatam kayasucaritam vacisucaritam manosucaritam tasmim karaniye kayiramane ayam anisamso patikankho—
an2.18:2.8: kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati.
an2.18:2.9: Yamidam, ananda, maya ekamsena karaniyam akkhatam kayasucaritam vacisucaritam manosucaritam tasmim karaniye kayiramane ayam anisamso patikankho”ti.
an2.19:1.3: No cedam, bhikkhave, sakka abhavissa akusalam pajahitum, naham evam vadeyyam:
an2.19:1.5: Yasma ca kho, bhikkhave, sakka akusalam pajahitum tasmaham evam vadami:
an2.19:1.7: Akusalanca hidam, bhikkhave, pahinam ahitaya dukkhaya samvatteyya naham evam vadeyyam:
an2.19:1.9: Yasma ca kho, bhikkhave, akusalam pahinam hitaya sukhaya samvattati tasmaham evam vadami:
an2.19:2.3: No cedam, bhikkhave, sakka abhavissa kusalam bhavetum, naham evam vadeyyam:
an2.19:2.5: Yasma ca kho, bhikkhave, sakka kusalam bhavetum tasmaham evam vadami:
an2.19:2.7: Kusalanca hidam, bhikkhave, bhavitam ahitaya dukkhaya samvatteyya, naham evam vadeyyam:
an2.19:2.9: Yasma ca kho, bhikkhave, kusalam bhavitam hitaya sukhaya samvattati tasmaham evam vadami:
an2.20:1.1: “Dveme, bhikkhave, dhamma saddhammassa sammosaya antaradhanaya samvattanti.
an2.20:1.4: Dunnikkhittassa, bhikkhave, padabyanjanassa atthopi dunnayo hoti.
an2.20:1.5: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve dhamma saddhammassa sammosaya antaradhanaya samvattanti”ti.
an2.20:2.1: “Dveme, bhikkhave, dhamma saddhammassa thitiya asammosaya anantaradhanaya samvattanti.
an2.20:2.4: Sunikkhittassa, bhikkhave, padabyanjanassa atthopi sunayo hoti.
an2.20:2.5: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve dhamma saddhammassa thitiya asammosaya anantaradhanaya samvattanti”ti.
